content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL with warning "out of fuel"; furnace_source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS with warning "no ingredients to smelt"; fuel inventory contains 2 units of coal and furnace_result holds 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status: NO_POWER, research set to automation, electrical_id updated to 8120.
- ElectricityGroup (id=8120) connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5) and (10.5, 7.5).

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED with warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL with warning "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output at (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_system set to [29692].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system set to [29692].
- Pipeline Network consisting of:
   • PipeGroup at position(-6.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=29692 – status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup at position(-2.5, 20.5) with fluid_system=29693 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 21.5) with fluid_system=29694 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-3.5, 23.5) with fluid_system=29699 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-7.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=29698 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(3.5, 25.5) with fluid_system=29703 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(2.5, 24.5) with fluid_system=29702 – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup at position(-0.5, 28.5) with fluid_system=29705 – status: EMPTY.
- Repeated connection attempts using fluid_system identifiers [29348, 29391, 29434, 29477, 29520, 29563, 29606, 29649] failed to supply water, leaving the steam engine NOT_CONNECTED.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Incorrect Fluid System Identifier Usage:
  - Validate and use the active fluid_system identifier (e.g., 29692) associated with the working PipeGroup. Avoid relying on outdated identifiers such as [29348, 29391, 29434, 29477, 29520, 29563, 29606, 29649].

• Inflexible Pipeline Stabilization Waiting:
  - Replace fixed waiting periods (10 seconds) with dynamic connectivity checks to ensure the pipeline is ready before attempting further connections.
